mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (login_id, username, email, password_hash, role_code, status_code, phone_number, address, birth_date, gender_code, join_date, last_login) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{username}, #{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{roleCode}, #{statusCode}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, #{birthDate}, #{genderCode}, #{joinDate}, #{lastLogin})
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.login_id, u.username, u.email, u.password_hash, u.role_code, u.status_code, u.phone_number, u.address, u.birth_date, u.gender_code, u.join_date, u.last_login, u.created_at, u.updated_at, COALESCE( (SELECT image_url FROM user_profile_images WHERE user_id = u.id ORDER BY reg_time DESC LIMIT 1), '/images/defaultProfile.png' ) as profile_image FROM users u WHERE u.login_id = #{loginId} AND u.status_code = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT u.id, u.login_id, u.username, u.email, u.password_hash, u.role_code, u.status_code, u.phone_number, u.address, u.birth_date, u.gender_code, u.join_date, u.last_login, u.created_at, u.updated_at, COALESCE( (SELECT image_url FROM user_profile_images WHERE user_id = u.id ORDER BY reg_time DESC LIMIT 1), '/images/defaultProfile.png' ) as profile_image FROM users u ORDER BY u.created_at DESC

SELECT u.id, u.login_id, u.username, u.email, u.password_hash, u.role_code, u.status_code, u.phone_number, u.address, u.birth_date, u.gender_code, u.join_date, u.last_login, u.created_at, u.updated_at, COALESCE( (SELECT image_url FROM user_profile_images WHERE user_id = u.id ORDER BY reg_time DESC LIMIT 1), '/images/defaultProfile.png' ) as profile_image FROM users u WHERE u.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, address = #{address}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, gender_code = #{genderCode}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
